google_reviews.author: Gina Fagan Kley
google_reviews.review: Erika Smith is the most professional and kind realtor Ive ever met. She helped me to sell my beloved home of 26 years and purchase my new home while grieving the recent loss of my spouse. I was confused about many steps of the process, but she gently and kindly assisted me throughout with genuine care, spot on professional advice and understanding. She went above and beyond checking in with me and offering assistance with the complicated decisions of downsizing my home and preparing my home for sale. My family and I are very grateful to her for working so diligently to get the best prices for both my old and new homes. Erika is an excellent realtor who gracefully knows how to navigate the complex realty business while demonstrating care and respect for clients complicated needs. My family and I highly recommend Ms Erika Smith of Coldwell Banker Bain.

google_reviews.author: A
google_reviews.review:
Working with Max Kwiatkowski and Matia Schwartz was an absolute dream come true. As a first-time homebuyer, I was completely lost - but they held my hand through every step of the process with patience, kindness, and a level of expertise that put my mind at ease. No matter how many questions my family threw their way, Max and Matia were always there with clear, comforting answers.

But their support went far beyond just explaining the process. They were our fierce advocates, using their magic touch to secure us an unbeatable deal on our move-in ready home - a staggering $16,000 off the asking price, practically unheard of in Whatcom! At every turn, they had our backs, working tirelessly to ensure we got the absolute best possible outcome.

The impact of Max and Matia's help cannot be overstated. With their guidance and our lender's support, they literally changed our lives for the better. We wouldn't be in our new home without them. I can't recommend Max and Matia enough - if we ever move or sell in the future, I wouldn't dream of working with anyone else. From the bottom of my heart, thank you both for everything you do.

google_reviews.author: Pete Gegenhuber
google_reviews.review: Our realtor went way, way above and beyond his responsibilities to provide us with excellent first class service! He took care of all our needs and made it a real pleasure, even when things went sideways, and we were worried about the sale. He stepped up and took care of everything! I would recommend Chuck Occhigrosso to everyone to sell their home, in a heartbeat. He is truly a man of honor and great integrity!

google_reviews.author: corey smith
google_reviews.review:
We worked with Ann Cantrell and Derek Buse to sell our home in Bellingham.  While they are both kind and friendly people, we were very disappointed with the sale overall.  In the initial listing, they made some errors, including the amount of rent charged for our lower unit and the type of heating in the home.

We were impressed by their marketing reach, but found that we had many questions along the way that went unanswered.  After receiving an offer, we found that Derek advised us to continue lowering the price again and again even in the final stages of negotiation.  He was less and less responsive the closer it got to closing; it almost seemed like the brokers were doing all the negotiating without our being included in the conversation.

When they were courting our business, Derek and Ann gave the impression we might get close to our initial listing price, but ultimately we ended up receiving a significantly lower amount.  We wish we had gone with Monte Young, who helped us buy our home originally, because he always took the time to answer questions and he gave us a realistic idea of what to expect every step of the way.

owner_response.text:
Hello Corey,
It sounds like you had an unfortunate experience; however, your experience wasnt with any of our agents and specifically not with Ann and Derek. We believe you may have the wrong company and wed like to respectfully request that you remove your review. We have reported your review to Google since it violates the following policies:

Spam and fake content: Your content should reflect your genuine experience at the location and should not be posted just to manipulate a places ratings.

Off-topic: Only post content based on your experience or questions about experiences at the specific location.

Google states We dont allow individuals to use Google Maps to mislead others. This applies to deceptive content as well as false representations.

If you have any further questions, please feel free to call us at (360) 734-3420. We look forward to this review being removed and wish you all the best.

Dean Ulrich, Principal Managing Broker of Coldwell Banker Bain of Bellingham

google_reviews.author: Tim B.
google_reviews.review: I can't imagine a better realtor than Coldwell Banker's Jeff Braimes. He has that great combination of professionalism and sincere friendliness. His ethics through a myriad of selling and buying situations were impeccable. He dealt collaboratively with other realtors, banks, builders, inspectors, etc. He clearly has experience and exceptional skill in all of the challenging turns that occur in real estate transactions. He helped us find the right buyer at the right price for our home, and then spent endless hours exploring a very wide and constantly changing variety of buy options for us. We learned a lot and by the time the right home came up, we were prepared to move. We are moving in this week, and still Jeff stays in direct contact to help keep things moving smoothly. Couldn't be more pleased and grateful for having met Jeff.

google_reviews.author: Herman Hamm
google_reviews.review: My agent, Ms. Stephanie McSorley, is the best advocate I have ever had as my representative,  She has found property for me more than once, and - for a friend of mine- at least twice.  I have owned 12 parcels of land over the years, and I know what agents are like.  She is light-years above the average and/or median.   Proactive, aggressive in getting the fest deal financially, immediate follow-up on any unresolved issues, and committed to client satisfaction.  She is a thorough professional and a credit to BainCB.

google_reviews.author: Pamela Banin
google_reviews.review:
Bryan Smith is the best possible real estate agent ever!! I would never have a home in Bellingham without Bryan's expertise and endless patience,during a confusing and challenging sequence of events.We still keep in touch if a question arises, and other family members are working with Bryan presently and are equally pleased. Thank you so much!!!
Pamela B.

google_reviews.author: Eric McRory
google_reviews.review: Charly Meyers did a fantastic job handling a real estate transaction between me and a personal friend.  My primary concern was that my personal relationship with the seller would be preserved and the utmost of respect would be provided for maintaining the integrity of this relationship.  Charly did a fantastic job earning the trust of the seller and at the same time protecting me as the buyer.  Great diplomacy!  I would recommend Charly to anyone.

google_reviews.author: Eighteen Echo
google_reviews.review: Have worked with Ed Hanley of and on for the last 15 years. Mr. Hanley is a very competent, friendly, and hard working realtor. So when we decide to downsize our home in retirement we will definitely hire him again.

google_reviews.author: Denis McGuire
google_reviews.review:
Carrie Vike Hilleary's professionalism, care and attention, when we recently purchased a home in Bellingham, was outstanding. My family and I would certainly recommend Carrie to anyone looking for an agent to sell or purchase property.
Thank you Carrie
Denis McGuire

google_reviews.author: Mark Lawrence Dobbie
google_reviews.review: It was an education and a joy to learn about the process of selling a house and to be helped through it. I can't imagine a happier experience (and the circumstances were by no means easy). Mr. Hanley's readiness to help and, at the same time, his discretion, were exemplary. Nothing can beat the human touch we experienced. Thank you.

google_reviews.author: Sebrina Holmstrom
google_reviews.review:
Ken Harrison is the Best!He is considerate, kind ,Funny and would be my first choice!
In January my Sister lost her husband to heart disease. Two years prior she was a flight attendant for Alaska and at 50 yrs old had a severe stroke!
We needed the perfect home for her where she could be some what independent. Dawn also wanted to live on the water!
Considering we had to move her here from Boise we had some time.
Ken was patient with her,lots of issues ,probate , attorneys and Idaho laws!
Ken reached out to his fellow realtors and found Dawn the perfect condo!
First floor ,1 step inside .
Amazing view !
Affordable!
Ken is and always will be very special to me and now is a shining star in my sisters eyes!
Thank you Ken Harrison!

Sebrina Holmstrom &Dawn Vermeulen

google_reviews.author: Rick Wilson
google_reviews.review: Greg Grant is a no-nonsense, get things done guy. His honesty and integrity are beyond reproach. I have had the opportunity to participate in several real estate transactions with him. I marvel at his expertise.

google_reviews.author: Allan Chaloupka
google_reviews.review: We liked that Ken Harrison kept with us for nearly four years until we found the house that was right for us. No matter how many times he took us to see properties, he was cheerful and always trying to help us find "the one."

google_reviews.author: Kayla Dalle
google_reviews.review: Trish at CBB is amazing! In a crazy market like this you need an agent like Trish to get your dream house! We will always work with her in the future.

google_reviews.author: Peter Venable
google_reviews.review: Lori Jo Smith is such a great person to work with and she gets things done quickly when it matters.

google_reviews.author: Linda Leum
google_reviews.review: ken harrison was excellent in every way!

summary.text:
Good

Coldwell Banker Bain of Bellingham has garnered positive feedback from a number of users who highlight the professionalism and dedication of their realtors. For example, one tenant praised an agent for her ability to guide them through the complexities of selling their home after a significant personal loss, demonstrating exceptional care and kindness throughout the process. This sentiment of proactive support can be seen across multiple reviews, where agents are recognized for being knowledgeable and going the extra mile to ensure clients feel comfortable and informed.

Another theme evident in the user reviews is the willingness of agents to provide continuous support even after the sale. Several reviewers noted that their agents maintained contact and provided assistance after transactions were completed, reassuring clients that they were there for them during the entire journey. Overall, this consistent professionalism and the courteous approach of the staff contribute greatly to the positive perception of Coldwell Banker Bain in the local community.

Great

The experiences shared by users regarding their real estate transactions with Coldwell Banker Bain are overwhelmingly positive, particularly regarding the capabilities of individual agents. For instance, multiple users expressed immense gratitude toward their realtors for securing great deals, such as significantly below asking prices. One user specifically noted receiving $16,000 off their first home, which showcases the agents' dedication to not just facilitating sales but also advocating strongly for their clients' financial interests.

Bad

Ugly
